Text: Do you know what the song title is 13 minutes into the show?
Why can't I find the other 7 episodes? Does anybody know where to find them?

To clear up some confusion... 
The 'series' is apparently eight brief (6 to 8 minute) online episodes -- viewable in their original form from YouTube and the BBC.  (The latter is not available to North American IP addresses, however.) 
The fifty-some minute video here is the eight brief episodes strung together as a 'conventional' broadcast program.  
There's a bit more information at:
http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Becoming_Human
